org.ligoj.app.resource.subscription

Class SubscriptionResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.node.AbstractLockedResource<java.lang.Integer>
      • org.ligoj.app.resource.subscription.SubscriptionResource

  • @Path(value="/subscription")
 @Service
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class SubscriptionResource
extends AbstractLockedResource<java.lang.Integer>
    Subscription resource.

      • toEntity

        public static Subscription toEntity(SubscriptionEditionVo vo,
                                    Project project,
                                    Node node)
        SubscriptionEditionVo to JPA entity transformer.
        Parameters:
        vo - The object to convert.
        project - The related project.
        node - The related node.
        Returns:
        The mapped entity.

      • getNonSecuredParameters

        @GET
 @Path(value="{id:\\d+}")
 @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getNonSecuredParameters(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                              int id)
        Return non secured parameters values related to the subscription.The attached project is validated against the current user to check it is visible. Secured parameters (even the encrypted ones) are not returned. The visibility of this subscription is checked.
        Parameters:
        id - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        secured associated parameters values. Key of returned map is the identifier of Parameter

      • getConfiguration

        @GET
 @Path(value="{id:\\d+}/configuration")
 @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public ConfigurationVo getConfiguration(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                    int id)
                                                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Return tools specific configuration. Only non secured parameters are returned.
        Parameters:
        id - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        tools specific configuration.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getParameters

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParameters(int id)
        Return all parameters values related to the subscription. The attached project is validated against the current user to check it is visible. Beware, these parameters must not be returned to user, since clear encrypted parameters are present.
        Parameters:
        id - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        all associated parameters values. Key of returned map is the identifier of Parameter

      • getParametersNoCheck

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getParametersNoCheck(int id)
        Return all parameters values related to the subscription. The visibility of attached project is not checked in this case. Secured (encrypted) parameters are decrypted.
        Parameters:
        id - The subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        all associated parameters values. Key of returned map is the identifier of Parameter

      • create

        @POST
public int create(SubscriptionEditionVo vo)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Create subscription.
        Parameters:
        vo - the subscription.
        Returns:
        the created Subscription.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • delete

        @Path(value="{id:\\d+}")
 @DELETE
public void delete(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                     int id)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete entity and cascaded associations : parameters, events then subscription. Note that remote data are not deleted. Links are just destroyed.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity identifier.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • delete

        @Path(value="{id:\\d+}/{deleteRemoteData}")
 @DELETE
public void delete(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                        int id,
                                                                        @PathParam(value="deleteRemoteData")
                                                                        boolean deleteRemoteData)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete entity and cascaded associations : parameters, events then subscription.
        Parameters:
        id - the entity identifier.
        deleteRemoteData - When true, remote data will be also destroyed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkVisibleSubscription

        public Subscription checkVisibleSubscription(int id)
        Check the given subscription is visible.
        Parameters:
        id - Subscription identifier.
        Returns:
        the loaded subscription.

      • findAll

        @GET
 @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public SubscriptionListVo findAll()
        Return all subscriptions and related nodes. Very light data are returned there since a lot of subscriptions there. Parameters values are not fetch.
        Returns:
        Status of each subscription of each project and each node.

      • getStatusByProject

        @Path(value="status/{project:\\d+}")
 @GET
 @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,EventVo> getStatusByProject(@PathParam(value="project")
                                                                                                                                             int project)
        Retrieve the last known status of subscriptions of given project .
        Parameters:
        project - project identifier
        Returns:
        Status of each subscription of given project.

      • refreshStatus

        @Path(value="status/{id:\\d+}/refresh")
 @GET
public org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionStatusWithData refreshStatus(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                int id)
        Get fresh status of given subscription. This fresh status is also stored in the data base. The project must be visible to current user.
        Parameters:
        id - Node identifier
        Returns:
        Status of each subscription of given project.

      • refreshStatuses

        @Path(value="status/refresh")
 @GET
public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,org.ligoj.app.api.SubscriptionStatusWithData> refreshStatuses(@QueryParam(value="id")
                                                                                                                                         java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> ids)
        Get fresh status of a set of subscriptions. This a loop shortcut of the per-subscription call.
        Parameters:
        ids - Node identifiers
        Returns:
        Status of each subscription of given project. Order is not guaranteed.
        See Also:
        refreshStatus(int)
